title: Start
body:
What are you?
-> A troll
    <<set $troll to true >>
-> A nice person
    <<set $troll to false >>
<<jump Objective>>

title: BasicIf
body:
<<set $testvar = 321>>
Text before
<<if $testvar == 321>>
Inside if
Inside if2<<endif>>Text after

title: BasicIfElse
body:
<<set $testvar = 321>>
Text before
<<if $testvar == 123>>
Inside if
<<else>>
Inside else
<<endif>>
Text after

title: BasicIfElseIf
body:
<<set $testvar = 321>>
Text before
<<if $testvar == 123>>
Inside if
<<elseif $testvar == 321>>
Inside elseif
<<endif>>
Text after

title: BasicIfElseIfElse
body:
<<set $testvar = 321>>
Text before
<<if $testvar == 123>>
Inside if
<<elseif $testvar == 1>>
Inside elseif
<<else>>
Inside else
<<endif>>
Text after

title: ConditionalOption
body:
<<set $haskey to true>>
Text before
-> Cond Option<<if $haskey == true>>
	<<jump Objective>>
Text after

title: IfNotFunction
body:
<<if not returnFalse()>>
Inside if
<<endif>>
Text after

title: OptionAfterSuccessConditional
body:
<<set $haskey to true>>
Text before
<<if $haskey == true>>
Inside if
<<endif>>
Text after
-> FinalOption
	<<jump Objective>>

title: TextAfterJumpAfterOption
body:
Text before
Inside if
-> Give key
	<<jump give_key>>
Text after

title: OptionAfterOptionWithinConditional
body:
<<set $haskey to true>>
Text before
<<if $haskey == true>>
Inside if
-> Give key
	<<jump give_key>>
-> You keep the key.
	The troll is displeased.
<<endif>>
Text after
-> FinalOption
	<<jump Objective>>

title: ArithmeticExpressionConditional
body:
<<set $testvar1 to 100>>
<<set $haskey1 to true>>
<<set $haskey2 to false>>
<<if ($haskey1 == true || $haskey2 == true) && $testvar1 >= 80>>
Inside if
<<elseif $testvar1 < 50>>
Hello there
<<endif>>
Text after
<<set $testvar1 to 70>>
<<if ($haskey1 == true || $haskey2 == true) && $testvar1 >= 80>>
Inside if2
<<elseif $testvar1 < 50>>
Hello there
<<endif>>
Final text

title: give_key
body: You give the key to the troll.
